name: Dungeon Quest (itch) (v0lt)
description:
Dungeeon Quest is a simple dungeon crawler game inspired by the Princess Quest minigames from FNAF Security Breach.

Story:

You play the role of a Knight who's dream is to get the title of "Ultimate Knight" by completing the deadliest dungeon in the world.

Gameplay:

Explore the maps, kill the enemies and look for secrets to become stronger and progress through the dungeon.

Side notes:

I made this game using Unity 4.7.2 which is a pretty old engine becuase my PC broke and I had to use a laptop from 2005 to make this game and is the most it could support, so i was pretty limited in terms of tools and I had to code a lot of stuff from 0, for example the AI. So just keep in mind that the game might not run perfectly.

Discord server: https://discord.gg/jKXvXyTzYn
